channel.title: Projects on Akhil's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Akhil's Homepage

item.title: Device File Virtualization
item.description: Developed as part of a team a proof of concept for device file virtualization for Palacios Virtual Machine Monitor. The concept allows a Linux guest to access the device files of the Linux host. Our implenattion was pulled into the main repository available publically at this link. This project started as part of a course and was developed further during an independent study.

item.title: Determining the Impact of Hashtags used in Marketing Campaigns on Social Media Platforms Using Sentiment Analysis
item.description: Hashtags have become a common way of aggregating a group of social media users around a common topic. Most social media sites have incorporated this feature and it is now starting to be used by marketing agencies as way to engage with its audience and gauge their response to their campaigns. In this project I develop a ranking system based on quantitatively (like the number of people using a particular hashtag, etc.) and qualitatively (Using sentiment analysis to classify the userâ€™s engagement as a positive or a negative, and associate an emotional response to it) analyzing data gathered social media outlets (primarily twitter). I hope that this method is able to provide a consistent view of the engagement level of users towards a product based on the hashtags associated with it.

item.title: Study of Loop perforation in GP-GPU applications
Study And Implementation Of Real Time Operating Systems For 8-bit Microcontrollers
item.description: Report on Internship at IIT Delhi in summer 2011. I studied Real Time operating systems (RTOS) and surveyed the possible RTOS options available for a TinyAVR microcontrollers. Chose to use Femto OS. Built the reference board and implemented an I2C driver for Femto OS for the design.

item.title: Design and implementation of a programmer for TI CC2530
item.description: As Part of Internship at IIT Delhi, Learnt the basics related to using linux and open source tools to do projects in embedded systems. As a minor task to show case the knowledge I had to develop a microcontroller based programmer for the SoC TI CC2530. I Developed the embedded hardware and software for the programmer based on a given design. Also patched the Linux OS application for the programmer to provide it the ability to recognize and program the SoC.

item.title: PC Board Design for 8051 Microcontroller
item.description: As Part of Internship at IIT Delhi, Learnt the basics related to embedded systems, in particular microcontrollers and PCB design for a basic development board for the 8051.
